tourBios.carHigh:
2013: In his first year on the Web.com Tour, competed in 21 events, making seven cuts. Best finishes came at the Chitmacha Louisiana Open (T13) and WNB Golf Classic (T15). Low round of the year was a 66 in the BMW Charity Pro-Am.

2012: In his first career Web.com Tour start, he was T46 at the Neediest Kids Championship, where he was a Monday qualifier.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Earned eight letters, two in basketball, two in baseball and four in golf, at Cary Christian School. Was a four-time participant in the North Carolina state high school championship, winning the individual title in 2006 and was a member of the championship team in 2008. Was team MVP all four seasons in high school...Won four college events at Wake Forest. Was a two-time, honorable mention All-American and a three-time All-ACC selection. Was Academic All-ACC and an Academic All-American...Won the Carolinas Junior in 2007 and was once North Carolina's top-ranked amateur...Was a playoff runner-up at the 2011 Sunnehanna Amateur in Pennsylvania.
tourBios.personal: Attended Cary Christina School...If he were not a golfer, he would be a trader on Wall Street...Favorite college teams are Wake Forest and North Carolina State...Carries pecans in his golf bag...Not many people know he was a good baseball player...Twitter account is @LeeBedford1.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T13th in 2013 at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open.
